Classic

PEPPERONI PROTEIN PIZZA

Classic pepperoni on a high protein crust. 40g protein per serving.

40g
Protein
450
Calories
33m
Total Time
2
Yield

Nutrition per 1/2 pizza

Carbs32g
Fat20g
Fiber4g
Sugar4g
DifficultyEasy

INGREDIENTS

  • 1 protein pizza crust
  • 60ml pizza sauce
  • 120g shredded mozzarella
  • 50g turkey pepperoni
  • 5g oregano
  • Red pepper flakes to taste

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Prepare

Par-bake protein crust for 8 minutes at 425¬∞F.

2

Sauce

Spread pizza sauce over crust.

3

Cheese

Add mozzarella cheese.

4

Pepperoni

Arrange turkey pepperoni on top.

5

Bake

Bake 10 minutes. Sprinkle with oregano and red pepper flakes.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
